data.text: Here are more wise sayings/words that Solomon wrote. Some men who worked for Hezekiah, the king of Judah, copied them from a scroll that Solomon had written.
We consider God to be great because he ◄acts in mysterious ways/does things that we cannot understand►;
It is not possible for anyone to measure how high the sky is or how deep the earth/ocean is;
If workers burn out the impure bits that are in silver,
Similarly, if wicked advisors are taken away from a king,
When you stand in front of a king, do not try to ◄impress him/honor yourself►
it is better if someone tells you to sit closer to the king
Do not quickly go to a court to tell the judge about something that you have seen,
If you and someone else think differently about some matter,
If others find out that you have told secrets,
Something that is said that is very appropriate
When a wise person rebukes/warns someone [SYN] who is willing to listen,
A messenger who ◄is reliable/tells someone else exactly what he was told to say► refreshes the spirits of his bosses who sent him
When someone promises to give a gift to us but never gives it,
If someone keeps requesting a ruler long enough to do something, he will often agree to do it;
If you find some honey, do not eat a lot of it,
Do not go to your neighbor’s house very often to talk with him;
To falsely accuse others in court
Depending on unreliable people when you have troubles
Singing to someone who is depressed just causes him to feel worse;
If your enemies are hungry, give them something to eat;
doing that will cause them to feel ashamed [IDM],
When wind blows from the right direction, it will rain;
It is better to live ◄alone/by yourself► in the corner of an attic/housetop
Receiving good news from a country far away refreshes our spirits
When a righteous/good person ◄gives in/yields► to wicked people,
It is not good to eat too much honey,
People who ◄cannot control their tempers/quickly become very angry► are unable to defend their behavior;
